title: Senior Lead, Visual Design, Apple Services Engineering
summary: The Apple Services Engineering (ASE) team is one of the most exciting examples of Apple’s long-held passion for combining art and technology. Looking for an experienced senior designer to lead creative strategy and execution for ASE internal content and initiatives.
description: In this role, you will lead creative for Apple Services Engineering and provide design support to various teams and senior executives...
preferred_qualifications: Deep understanding of visual storytelling across platforms and formats. Exceptional attention to detail. Experience presenting creative concepts to leadership...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range...
